tool_info.name: Fetcher MCP
tool_info.author: jae-jae
tool_info.description: 用于通过 Playwright 无头浏览器获取网页内容的 MCP 服务器。支持智能内容提取和多样的输出格式。需要通过 'npx playwright install chromium' 安装 Playwright 浏览器。

available_tools.name: fetch_url
available_tools.description: Retrieve web page content from a specified URL

timeout.description: Page loading timeout in milliseconds, default is 30000 (30 seconds)

waitUntil.description: Specifies when navigation is considered complete, options: 'load', 'domcontentloaded', 'networkidle', 'commit', default is 'load'

extractContent.description: Whether to intelligently extract the main content, default is true

maxLength.description: Maximum length of returned content (in characters), default is no limit

returnHtml.description: Whether to return HTML content instead of Markdown, default is false

waitForNavigation.description: Whether to wait for additional navigation after initial page load (useful for sites with anti-bot verification), default is false

navigationTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for additional navigation in milliseconds, default is 10000 (10 seconds)

disableMedia.description: Whether to disable media resources (images, stylesheets, fonts, media), default is true

debug.description: Whether to enable debug mode (showing browser window), overrides the --debug command line flag if specified

available_tools.name: fetch_urls
available_tools.description: Retrieve web page content from multiple specified URLs

timeout.description: Page loading timeout in milliseconds, default is 30000 (30 seconds)

waitUntil.description: Specifies when navigation is considered complete, options: 'load', 'domcontentloaded', 'networkidle', 'commit', default is 'load'

extractContent.description: Whether to intelligently extract the main content, default is true

maxLength.description: Maximum length of returned content (in characters), default is no limit

returnHtml.description: Whether to return HTML content instead of Markdown, default is false

waitForNavigation.description: Whether to wait for additional navigation after initial page load (useful for sites with anti-bot verification), default is false

navigationTimeout.description: Maximum time to wait for additional navigation in milliseconds, default is 10000 (10 seconds)

disableMedia.description: Whether to disable media resources (images, stylesheets, fonts, media), default is true

debug.description: Whether to enable debug mode (showing browser window), overrides the --debug command line flag if specified

output_data.result: 测试通过。工具成功调用并返回了预期的网页内容，响应结构完整且包含正确的示例域名相关信息。响应时间7.782秒略偏高，但考虑到网络请求的不确定性，仍在合理范围内。
测试失败。虽然工具成功返回了响应且 success 字段为 true，但实际内容中 Title 和网页正文部分为空，未提取到预期的网页内容（如 'Example Domain' 或其他有效文本）。这表明尽管 fetch_url 工具完成了调用流程，但未能正确提取或返回目标网页的实际文本内容。执行时间53.291秒明显偏长，可能涉及性能问题或页面加载阻塞。
测试未通过，状态为错误。工具调用失败，返回错误信息为 '请求超时'，说明在指定的超时时间内未能完成对多个URL的并发获取操作。这表明 fetch_urls 工具在当前配置下无法有效处理并发请求，可能由于资源限制、网络延迟或内部调度机制问题导致整体超时。执行时间60.010秒达到阈值，触发了超时机制。

test_executions.test_name: 错误处理测试 - 无效URL

output_data.result: 测试未通过，状态为失败。测试用例旨在验证工具在面对无效URL时是否能正确处理错误并返回预期的错误提示（如超时或连接失败）。然而，工具并未返回错误，而是成功返回了一个由DreamHost托管的默认页面内容，表明其错误检测机制未能识别该URL为无效或不可达状态。这可能导致用户误以为目标网站有效，从而引发后续逻辑错误。执行时间5.375秒在合理范围内，但结果不符合预期的错误类型。

test_executions.test_name: 参数验证测试 - 超长内容限制

output_data.result: 测试未通过，状态为失败。虽然工具成功返回了响应且未出现错误，但返回内容的实际长度明显超过了参数中指定的 maxLength: 100 字符限制。期望结果是内容被截断或限制在100字符以内，但实际返回的文本长度远超该限制，说明 maxLength 参数未被正确应用或处理。响应时间4.347秒在合理范围内，但功能未按预期实现。
